ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste (Optional)

cookingTips: Render bacon until crispy, then use the fat to cook Brussels sprouts for maximum flavor
Place Brussels sprouts cut-side down in the skillet to develop a golden, caramelized crust
Cook for 15-20 minutes total, stirring occasionally, until Brussels sprouts are tender inside and crispy outside
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through rendering bacon properly, achieving caramelization on Brussels sprouts, and balancing flavors.
